Metadata.title: Video Toolkit
Metadata.description: Trim and export your clips in seconds.

metadata.title: Online Video Trimmer | Video Toolkit
metadata.description: Trim MP4, MOV and other clips right in your browser. Set precise start/end times, preview instantly and export privacy-safe results in seconds—no login required and nothing ever leaves your browser.
metadata.keywords: online video trimmer,video cutter,trim mp4,browser video editor,free video tool,no login video editor,offline video trimmer

upload.replace: Click or drag to pick a different video
upload.helper: Supports MP4, MOV and other common formats. You can only select one file.

assurance.noUpload: Your video never leaves your browser

Home.title: Your multilingual video workbench
Home.description: Trim, preview and export clips from any modern browser.

browser.title: Trim videos right in the browser
browser.description:
Runs entirely in your browser—no installs or extensions required.
Just drop a file and start trimming.

security.title: Privacy-first processing
security.description:
Your video never leaves your device.
Disconnect after loading the page and trimming still works.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.description: Feature requests and bug reports are always welcome.
Contact.screenshot: Sending a screenshot along with your report would be very helpful.
